General.Name: TOBESOFT Co. Ltd
General.Description: TOBESOFT Co., Ltd., a software company, develops and sells UI and UX technology solutions in South Korea. The company offers nexacro platform 17, a UI UX real OSMU solution; XPLATFORM, a UI UX platform for implementing smart business environments; Nex-Up, a server framework for service development; and X-Push, a real time push server. It also provides BUX consulting and conversion services; and Fusion platform, an AI-powered digital transformation solution. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
